subject: Order #SSN1874 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Please let me know as soon as possible. The shipping website states the order has been delivered but only the haptics have. Even the courier picture shows that one small box. Kind regards Wayne
Hi Wayne Readshaw,  I'm very sorry, after confirming that we did miss your pedal, we've reshipped it via UPS and expect it to arrive for you on the 19th.

I've finally got the pedals that you forgot to send me, and despite setting them up with the haptic reactors, the haptics have stopped working within about ten minutes of use.

I've tried updating, disconnecting, reconnecting, rebooting my PC several times and so on.

Any thoughts as my first impressions aren't good.
________________________________

Hi Wayne Readshaw,    First, please update your software to version 2.0.9 and set the VAM motor strength to 50%, even when using SIMHUB 9.9.3.  To prevent potential damage to the VAM motor, try to avoid telemetry effects based on speed or RPM, as these can cause the motor to run continuously for extended periods, leading to overheating or excessive wear.

I’ve tried that and there’s still no response. The Simsonn manager settings are now at 50% VAM and on SimHub 9.9.3, the settings are 50% for TC and wheelslip etc but no response. The haptics show as having power also. I’ve updated firmware (oddly it’s asked me to several times already). Kind regards Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,  First, please confirm that the software version is 2.0.9 and the hardware version is either 2.0.2 or 2.0.0.           Next, please confirm that the power is properly connected, then click the corresponding vibration test button or swap the connection ports to check if all three VAM units vibrate normally. If there is no vibration, the device may already be damaged due to excessive force or prolonged continuous vibration telemetry. If they vibrate normally, then the issue is likely related to telemetry. Let’s test them separately first.

Hi - I’ve done the checks. Power connected (though the power cable plug does easily come out of the hub) to the haptics but no response on checking vibration either in manager app or in sim games. All software / hardware up to date. 

I have throttle and brake pedals only so tried the other haptic and whilst it initially worked, it quickly stopped working like the other two, before i even experienced it in game. 

I only had gain at 50% with TC / ABS / wheelslip and played minutes in any game. I couldn’t even tell you if the haptics were working when I did play. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,    The power connector tends to loosen easily, so please secure it with a cable tie to prevent it from disconnecting due to rig movement. Your device is connected to the blue USB 3.0 port at the back of your PC rather than through a USB hub, correct? Also, have you tried using SIMHUB 9.9.3?  Please test all three motors individually by plugging them into each motor port on the PlusX control box. Then, in the SIMSONN Manager interface with the power connected, test the motor vibration, ABS telemetry, and VAM configuration to check if the vibration is abnormal. If the issue is confirmed, we will replace it free of charge.

Hi there - thanks for writing back. 

It’s definitely plugged into a blue USB 3.0 port and I’ve tried SimHub 9.9.3. 

Having tried every combination of haptics in each port, there’s still no response. 

I’d be grateful if you could send a replacement set. 

Many thanks. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,  Are all three motors not working? Please share a screenshot of the motor mode configuration so I can check if the strength settings are appropriate. Otherwise, I’m concerned that even after sending replacements, they might fail again. In that case, I might consider only selling the VAM Pro motors. This motor doesn’t require very high force settings and may not be suitable for long-term heavy use. However, since many users and customers prefer this more affordable version, it has also significantly increased our after-sales costs.

None of the haptics work. 



Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,  Please upgrade to version 2.1.0 first and test the motor vibration to confirm whether all three motors have no response at all. Our operations team will assist you with the replacement shipment tomorrow.

Can you let me know what’s happening now please?

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,  Please update the software to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 and then update the firmware to the latest version.  After that, connect the power and test all three vibration motors.  I need you to provide a video of the vibration testing process, as text alone is not sufficient to quickly address your issue.

Video attached. 
Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi- can you let me know about this as soon as possible please?

You did say that you would replace the haptics. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,    We apologize for not receiving your video. Please resubmit it. It is highly unlikely that all three tactile sensors would be damaged at the same time, so we must first determine the cause of the issue before arranging for a replacement. Is your pedal functioning properly?

Please let me know what you’re suggesting now as this is dragging on too long. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi - I’m going to have to put an ultimatum on this now. If I don’t hear back by 14th August, I will have to lodge a dispute with my credit card provider. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

I haven’t got around to lodging a dispute with my credit card provider so I’ll give you the benefit of the doubt and will wait until 20th August for a response from you with a proposed resolution. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

You have one more chance to respond and if not, I will be pursuing this with my card provider. I’ve been quite patient and you have repeatedly refused to respond. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

We sincerely apologise for the prolonged delay in resolving your issue. As we did not receive your follow-up correspondence, so this ticket remained closed. We shall reopen it immediately and provide appropriate compensation. Please withdraw the dispute you initiated. Sincerely apologise!

I sent you multiple clear emails over several weeks so you had ample opportunity to respond, even if to say you couldn’t or wouldn’t help. 

I also made it clear in each email, that if I didn’t receive a response (I actually waited a lot longer than planned), I would lodge a dispute. 

If I withdraw the dispute, how do I know you won’t go back to ignoring me? Until such time that you satisfactorily, resolve the problem (ideally replacing the items as you said you would), the dispute will have to remain I’m afraid. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

I don’t appear to receive a follow-up response with tracking. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Are we back to the silence again?

Kind regards 

Wayne

Hi Wayne Readshaw,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have shipped three VAM Haptics units to you. Here is your tracking number.  To clarify, we cannot see your replies unless we actively search for your emails, which is why we haven't responded earlier. We sincerely apologize for the poor experience this has caused. The package's tracking information will be updated tomorrow. We hope you will cancel the chargeback at that time. Thank you for your understanding.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045943668283

Hi Wayne Readshaw,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. I see your refund has been processed, and we have intercepted your replacement package.                                                   .

Are you saying that a replacement for the haptics isn’t being sent now? 

I do want the product and it’s months later and I’m still without. 

Kind regards 

Wayne

Please confirm to my query below. 

Kind regards 

Wayne
